text: Elita Krūmiņa in 2013 Elita Krūmiņa (born 21 November 1965 in Jelgava) has been the auditor general of Latvia since 21 January 2013. Prior to becoming auditor general, Krūmiņa was a member of the council of Latvia's state audit office; she became a member in 2005 after spending six years at the Latvian Ministry of Finance. ==References== ==External links== Category:People from Jelgava Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Government accounting officials Category:20th-century Latvian people
title: Elita Krūmiņa
